verses.verse: בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> le-Vi; of Levi גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> ge-re-Shon Gershon קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> ke-Hat Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> u-me-ra-Ri. and Merari

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> ke-Hat; of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> 'am-Ram Amram יִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> yitz-Har, Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> ve-chev-Ron and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> ve-'uz-zi-'El. and Uzziel ס sa-Mek

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the children עַמְרָ֔ם <WH6019> 'am-Ram, of Amram אַהֲרֹ֥ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron Aaron וּמֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> u-mo-Sheh and Moses וּמִרְיָ֑ם <WH4813> u-mir-Yam; and Miriam ס sa-Mek וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei The sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron, also of Aaron נָדָב֙ <WH5070> na-Dav Nadab וַאֲבִיה֔וּא <WH30> va-'a-vi-Hu, and Abihu אֶלְעָזָ֖ר <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar וְאִיתָמָֽר׃ <WH385> ve-'i-ta-Mar. and Ithamar ס sa-Mek

אֶלְעָזָר֙ <WH499> 'el-'a-Zar Eleazar הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פִּֽינְחָ֔ס <WH6372> pin-Chas, Phinehas פִּֽינְחָ֖ס <WH6372> pin-Chas Phinehas הֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲבִישֽׁוּעַ׃ <WH50> 'a-vi-Shu-a'. Abishua

וַאֲבִישׁ֙וּעַ֙ <WH50> va-'a-vi-Shu-a' And Abishua הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֻּקִּ֔י <WH1231> buk-Ki, Bukki וּבֻקִּ֖י <WH1231> u-vuk-Ki and Bukki הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֻזִּֽי׃ <WH5813> 'uz-Zi. Uzzi

וְעֻזִּי֙ <WH5813> ve-'uz-Zi And Uzzi הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זְרַֽחְיָ֔ה <WH2228> ze-rach-Yah, Zerahiah וּֽזְרַֽחְיָ֖ה <WH2228> u-ze-rach-Yah and Zerahiah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- מְרָיֽוֹת׃ <WH4812> me-ra-Yot. Meraioth

מְרָיוֹת֙ <WH4812> me-ra-yOt Meraioth הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲמַרְיָ֔ה <WH568> 'a-mar-Yah, Amariah וַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> va-'a-mar-Yah and Amariah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <WH285> 'a-chi-Tuv. Ahitub

וַאֲחִיטוּב֙ <WH285> va-'a-chi-Tuv And Ahitub הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צָד֔וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok, Zadok וְצָד֖וֹק <WH6659> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחִימָֽעַץ׃ <WH290> 'a-chi-Ma-'atz. Ahimaaz

וַאֲחִימַ֙עַץ֙ <WH290> va-'a-chi-Ma-'atz And Ahimaaz הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲזַרְיָ֔ה <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah, Azariah וַעֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> va-'a-zar-Yah and Azariah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יוֹחָנָֽן׃ <WH3110> yo-cha-Nan. Johanan

וְיוֹחָנָ֖ן <WH3110> ve-yo-cha-Nan And Johanan הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲזַרְיָ֑ה <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah; Azariah ה֚וּא <WH1931> hu he אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who כִּהֵ֔ן <WH3547> ki-Hen, (he [it is] that executed the priest's office בַּבַּ֕יִת <WH1004> bab-Ba-yit in the temple אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which בָּנָ֥ה <WH1129> ba-Nah built שְׁלֹמֹ֖ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh that Solomon בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim. Jerusalem

וַיּ֥וֹלֶד <WH3205> vai-Yo-led begat עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah And Azariah אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲמַרְיָ֑ה <WH568> 'a-mar-Yah; Amariah וַאֲמַרְיָ֖ה <WH568> va-'a-mar-Yah and Amariah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֲחִיטֽוּב׃ <WH285> 'a-chi-Tuv. Ahitub

וַאֲחִיטוּב֙ <WH285> va-'a-chi-Tuv And Ahitub הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צָד֔וֹק <WH6659> tza-Dok, Zadok וְצָד֖וֹק <WH6659> ve-tza-Dok and Zadok הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שַׁלּֽוּם׃ <WH7967> shal-Lum. Shallum

וְשַׁלּוּם֙ <WH7967> ve-shal-Lum And Shallum הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חִלְקִיָּ֔ה <WH2518> chil-ki-Yah, Hilkiah וְחִלְקִיָּ֖ה <WH2518> ve-chil-ki-Yah and Hilkiah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֲזַרְיָֽה׃ <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah. Azariah

וַעֲזַרְיָה֙ <WH5838> va-'a-zar-Yah And Azariah הוֹלִ֣יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׂרָיָ֔ה <WH8304> se-ra-Yah, Seraiah וּשְׂרָיָ֖ה <WH8304> u-se-ra-Yah and Seraiah הוֹלִ֥יד <WH3205> ho-Lid begat אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוֹצָדָֽק׃ <WH3087> ye-ho-tza-Dak. Jehozadak

וִיהוֹצָדָ֣ק <WH3087> vi-ho-tza-Dak And Jehozadak הָלַ֔ךְ <WH1980> ha-Lach, went בְּהַגְל֣וֹת <WH1540> be-hag-Lot carried away יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, [into captivity] when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah Judah וִירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> vi-ru-sha-Lim; and Jerusalem בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> be-Yad by the hand נְבֻכַדְנֶאצַּֽר׃ <WH5019> ne-vu-chad-netz-Tzar. of Nebuchadnezzar ס sa-Mek
בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons לֵוִ֑י <WH3878> le-Vi; of Levi גֵּרְשֹׁ֕ם <WH1647> ge-re-Shom Gershom קְהָ֖ת <WH6955> ke-Hat Kohath וּמְרָרִֽי׃ <WH4847> u-me-ra-Ri. and Merari

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֥וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot And these [be] the names בְּֽנֵי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the sons גֵרְשׁ֖וֹם <WH1647> ge-re-Shom of Gershom לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> liv-Ni Libni וְשִׁמְעִֽי׃ <WH8096> ve-shim-'I. and Shimei

וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> ke-Hat; of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> 'am-Ram [were] Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> ve-yitz-Har, and Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> ve-chev-Ron and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵֽל׃ <WH5816> ve-'uz-zi-'El. and Uzziel

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> me-ra-Ri of Merari מַחְלִ֣י <WH4249> mach-Li Mahli וּמֻשִׁ֑י <WH4187> u-mu-Shi; and Mushi וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh and these מִשְׁפְּח֥וֹת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot And these [are] the families הַלֵּוִ֖י <WH3881> hal-le-Vi of the Levites לַאֲבוֹתֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH1> la-'a-vo-tei-Hem. according to their fathers

לְֽגֵרְשׁ֑וֹם <WH1647> le-ge-re-Shom; Of Gershom לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> liv-Ni Libni בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son יַ֥חַת <WH3189> Ya-chat Jahath בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son זִמָּ֥ה <WH2155> zim-Mah Zimmah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> ve-No. his son

יוֹאָ֤ח <WH3098> yo-'Ach Joah בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> be-No his son עִדּ֣וֹ <WH5714> id-Do Iddo בְנ֔וֹ <WH1121> ve-No, his son זֶ֥רַח <WH2226> Ze-rach Zerah בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son יְאָתְרַ֥י <WH2979> ye-'a-te-Rai Jeaterai בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son

בְּנֵ֖י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons קְהָ֑ת <WH6955> ke-Hat; of Kohath עַמִּינָדָ֣ב <WH5992> 'am-mi-na-Dav Amminadab בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son קֹ֥רַח <WH7141> Ko-rach Korah בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son אַסִּ֥יר <WH617> 'as-Sir Assir בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son

אֶלְקָנָ֥ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah Elkanah בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son וְאֶבְיָסָ֥ף <WH43> ve-'ev-ya-Saf and Ebiasaph בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son וְאַסִּ֥יר <WH617> ve-'as-Sir and Assir בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son

תַּ֤חַת <WH8480> Ta-chat Tahath בְּנוֹ֙ <WH1121> be-No his son אוּרִיאֵ֣ל <WH222> 'u-ri-'El Uriel בְּנ֔וֹ <WH1121> be-No, his son עֻזִּיָּ֥ה <WH5818> 'uz-zi-Yah Uzziah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son וְשָׁא֥וּל <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul and Shaul בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son
וּבְנֵי֙ <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah, of Elkanah עֲמָשַׂ֖י <WH6022> 'a-ma-Sai Amasai וַאֲחִימֽוֹת׃ <WH287> va-'a-chi-Mot. and Ahimoth

אֶלְקָנָ֑ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah; [As for] Elkanah; בְּנֹו be-nov כבְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> be-Nei his son קאֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah, of Elkanah צוֹפַ֥י <WH6689> tzo-Fai Zophai בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No the sons וְנַ֥חַת <WH5184> ve-Na-chat and Nahath בְּנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> be-No. his son

אֱלִיאָ֥ב <WH446> 'e-li-'Av Eliab בְּנ֛וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son יְרֹחָ֥ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham Jeroham בְּנ֖וֹ <WH1121> be-No his son אֶלְקָנָ֥ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah Elkanah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> ve-No. his son

וּבְנֵ֧י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons שְׁמוּאֵ֛ל <WH8050> she-mu-'El of Samuel הַבְּכֹ֥ר <WH1060> hab-be-Chor the firstborn וַשְׁנִ֖י <WH2059> vash-Ni Vashni וַאֲבִיָּֽה׃ <WH29> va-'a-vi-Yah. and Abiah ס sa-Mek

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons מְרָרִ֖י <WH4847> me-ra-Ri of Merari מַחְלִ֑י <WH4249> mach-Li; Mahli לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> liv-Ni Libni בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son שִׁמְעִ֥י <WH8096> shim-'I Shimei בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son עֻזָּ֥ה <WH5798> 'uz-Zah Uzza בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> ve-No. his son

שִׁמְעָ֥א <WH8092> shim-'A Shimea בְנ֛וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son חַגִּיָּ֥ה <WH2293> chag-gi-Yah Haggiah בְנ֖וֹ <WH1121> ve-No his son עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <WH6222> 'a-sa-Yah Asaiah בְנֽוֹ׃ <WH1121> ve-No. his son פ Peh

וְאֵ֗לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh, now these אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הֶעֱמִ֥יד <WH5975> he-'e-Mid set דָּוִ֛יד <WH1732> da-Vid And these [are they] whom David עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- over יְדֵי־ <WH3027> ye-dei- over the service שִׁ֖יר <WH7892> shir of song בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> beit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; of the LORD מִמְּנ֖וֹחַ <WH4494> mi-me-No-ach had rest הָאָרֽוֹן׃ <WH727> ha-'a-Ron. after that the ark

וַיִּהְי֨וּ <WH1961> vai-yih-Yu become מְשָׁרְתִ֜ים <WH8334> me-sha-re-Tim And they ministered לִפְנֵ֨י <WH6440> lif-Nei before מִשְׁכַּ֤ן <WH4908> mish-Kan the dwelling אֹֽהֶל־ <WH168> 'o-hel- place of the tabernacle מוֹעֵד֙ <WH4150> mo-'Ed of the congregation בַּשִּׁ֔יר <WH7892> bash-Shir, with singing עַד־ <WH5704> 'ad- until בְּנ֧וֹת <WH1129> be-Not had built שְׁלֹמֹ֛ה <WH8010> she-lo-Moh until Solomon אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> beit the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וַיַּעַמְד֥וּ <WH5975> vai-ya-'am-Du and [then] they waited כְמִשְׁפָּטָ֖ם <WH4941> che-mish-pa-Tam according to their order עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- according עֲבוֹדָתָֽם׃ <WH5656> a-vo-da-Tam. on their office

וְאֵ֥לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These הָעֹמְדִ֖ים <WH5975> ha-'o-me-Dim And these [are] they that waited וּבְנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH1121> u-ve-nei-Hem; with their children מִבְּנֵי֙ <WH1121> mib-be-Nei Of the sons הַקְּהָתִ֔י <WH6956> hak-ke-ha-Ti, of the Kohathites הֵימָן֙ <WH1968> hei-Man Heman הַמְשׁוֹרֵ֔ר <WH7891> ham-sho-Rer, a singer בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹאֵ֖ל <WH3100> yo-'El of Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> she-mu-'El. of Shemuel

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- The son אֶלְקָנָה֙ <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah of Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יְרֹחָ֔ם <WH3395> ye-ro-Cham, of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֱלִיאֵ֖ל <WH447> 'e-li-'El of Eliel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son תּֽוֹחַ׃ <WH8430> To-ach. of Toah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- The son; צִיף tzif כצוּף֙ <WH6689> Tzuf Zophai קבֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶלְקָנָ֔ה <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah, of Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son מַ֖חַת <WH4287> Ma-chat of Mahath בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֲמָשָֽׂי׃ <WH6022> 'a-ma-Sai. of Amasai

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- The son אֶלְקָנָה֙ <WH511> 'el-ka-Nah of Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹאֵ֔ל <WH3100> yo-'El, of Joel בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֲזַרְיָ֖ה <WH5838> 'a-zar-Yah of Azariah בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son צְפַנְיָֽה׃ <WH6846> tze-fan-Yah. of Zephaniah

בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- The son תַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8480> ta-chat of Tahath בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אַסִּ֔יר <WH617> 'as-Sir, of Assir בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֶבְיָסָ֖ף <WH43> 'ev-ya-Saf of Ebiasaph בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son קֹֽרַח׃ <WH7141> Ko-rach. of Korah
